title: Lf motivated players
body: Want to find people that play a lot and is motivated to climb im SIV at the moment anyone wanted to climb and spam add me.

replies.body: I'm a former S2, but now B3 due to dynamic soloQ. Looking to get back into silver and main JG/support and can do other roles except mid. I play nearly every evening till late.

I am looking to get outta bronze I am a mid lane main but can play most roles other than support add me 
I am bronze 3 and I play ahri as my main at the moment
I'm at B1 at the moment and I'm keen to play and climb. I just need some tips to improve my play. im an adc so add me :)
